General.Name: Lampix
General.Description: Lampix is a hardware and software solution that transforms any surface into a smart, augmented reality surface freeing human-computer interaction from digital screens.

ICO.Description:
Lampix is a hardware and software solution that transforms any surface into a smart, augmented reality surface freeing human-computer interaction from digital screens.

Team:

  • George Popescu: CEO.
  • Mihai Dumitrescu: CTO.
  • Dzmitry Varhan: Hardware.
  • Kyle Potter: Marketing.
  • Florin Mihoc: Business Development.

Lampix ICO began on August 9, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 50% of the total token supply. The ICO funding target is 60,000,000 USD and is expected to end on August 18, 2017.

Lampix ICO campaign will feature a bonus structure, as shown below.

Bonus Structure:

  • Day 1 Lampix will sell $20 million worth of tokens with a 15% bonus;
  • Day 2 Lampix will sell $20 million worth of tokens with a 10% bonus;
  • Day 3 to 10 Lampix will sell $20 million worth of token with a 5% bonus;
